page.title: 18Ashton Village
page.content: Ashton Village has a shopping centre in the community of Ashton on Mersey.There are different kinds of shops for everyday shopping on either side of a busy road. It has twenty one non-food shops, one restaurant, three building societies, three banks, one snack bar, one take-away hot food shop and eight food shops or supermarkets. Some of the non-food shops are newsagents, wool shops, hairdressers,a bicycle shop, an off licence, a travel agent and there is also a dogs' beauty centre. The village also has two public houses. There is a chemist's, a dentist's surgery, and an optician. Bigger shopping centres are found in the centre of Sale or a few miles away in the market town of Altrincham and the city of Manchester.
